sentence.Network_en: I was disapppointed at not finding her at home.
sentence.Network_cn: 我访她而她不在家,令我失望.

auth_sentence.content: You'd be disapppointed if there was no "oo-er" for that one!
auth_sentence.res_content: You'd be disapppointed if there was no "oo-er" for that one!
